about_the_game:
GAMEPLAY:

In this game, you'll need to sort liquids in bottles by color. Each bottle contains different layers of liquid, and your task is to move them in such a way that all liquids of the same color end up in the same bottle. Every move requires careful attention and strategic thinking, as you need to properly distribute the liquids without mixing the colors. It's an engaging process that will make you think through every step to successfully complete the level.

Monsters, long feared and shunned by society, have devised a cunning plan to change their fate. They seek to create a powerful potion, one capable of seducing the most enchanting beings in the land—beautiful Elven maidens with their ethereal grace, Demonic princesses with their dark allure, and the finest women of the human race, known for their unmatched beauty and charm.

You have the unique opportunity to assist these creatures in their ambitious endeavor. Your role will be crucial as you help them craft this magical elixir, designed to captivate the hearts and minds of these extraordinary ladies. Together, you will brew a potion so potent that it will turn the tables on the once-feared monsters, granting them access to a world of beauty and desire that they could only dream of.

FEATURES:

  • Pleasant music
  • Beautiful girls
  • Simple levels
  • Enjoyable pastime
  • Brew potions
